H0.text: Which 1960's British group originally comprised EricClapton, Steve Winwood, Ginger Baker and Ric Grech. Cream

H1.text: Which 1960's British group originally comprised EricClapton, Steve Winwood, Ginger Baker and Ric Grech. Traffic

H2.text: Which 1960's British group originally comprised EricClapton, Steve Winwood, Ginger Baker and Ric Grech. Ginger Baker's Airforce

H3.text: Which 1960's British group originally comprised EricClapton, Steve Winwood, Ginger Baker and Ric Grech. Blind Faith

A4.text: Blind Faith were an English rock supergroup that consisted of Steve Winwood, Eric Clapton, Ginger Baker, and Ric Grech.

A5.text: They followed the success of each of the member's former bands, including Clapton and Baker's former group Cream and Winwood's former group Traffic.
